{{cpp/numeric/random/chi_squared_distribution/title|n}}
{{cpp/numeric/random/chi_squared_distribution/navbar}}
{{ddcl | since=c++11 | 1=
RealType n() const;
}}

Returns the {{math|n}} parameter the distribution was constructed with. It specifies the [[enwiki:Degrees of freedom (statistics)|degrees of freedom]] of the distribution. The default value is {{c|1.0}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
The {{math|n}} distribution parameter.
